subject: Football
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Underdogs will, as usual, wreck a lot of N.C.A.A. tournament brackets. But no one, not even a fan on the court, seems able to stop the Miami Heat.
snippet: Underdogs will, as usual, wreck a lot of N.C.A.A. tournament brackets. But no one, not even a fan on the court, seems able to stop the Miami Heat.
